segments.text: It's heartbreaking to see the potential for an accident here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is so precariously balanced, reaching for those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move and he'll tumble down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's hopeful expression just makes it worse; she's too young for this risk.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman drying dishes won't even know until it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water overflowing everywhere, soaking the floor sadly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The peaceful garden view contrasts with this impending sorrow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a pang watching the innocent mischief turn hazardous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why can't moments like this stay safe and fun?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's tilt is like a sign of things falling apart.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Poor kids, caught in their little adventure without guidance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene tugs at my heartstrings in the worst way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The untouched dishes stack up, mirroring neglected duties.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could warn them before sadness strikes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Such a tender, vulnerable moment gone wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR
